text: Michael Jay Boskin (born September 23, 1945) is an American economist, businessman and politician. He is the T. M. Friedman Professor of Economics and senior Fellow at Stanford University's Hoover Institution. He also is Chief Executive Officer and President of Boskin & Co., an economic consulting company. Bush, he was the Chairman of the Council of Economic Advisers between 1989 to 1993. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:American economists Category:United States Council of Economic Advisers Category:Stanford University faculty Category:American political writers Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Writers from New York City Category:Businesspeople from New York City
